hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
### start main program ===================================
### working OK! cd /html/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors php5.6 gbif_georeference_dwca.php jenkins '{"task":"save_ids_to_text_from_many_folders"}' wc -l /extra/map_data_dwca/final_taxon_concept_IDS.txt
### start to tgz the map data folder =================================== per JRice ### working OK! cd /extra/ tar -czf map_data_dwca_$(date +"%Y-%m-%d").tgz map_data_dwca/ ls -l map_data_dwca_$(date +"%Y-%m-%d").tgz #just to verity the tgz file
